ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisAppointment of JUDITH BOER of Surrey, British Columbia, to be a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Vancouver Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of four years, effective June 12, 2017.
